item.title: Links
item.description: Live Coding Orca And SonicPi: https://merveilles.town/@Lutrinus/102544431172249330 A 3d programming language: https://github.com/curv3d/curv Nodes IO - a cool visual programming environment to watch http://nodes.io/story/ Sonic Pi Forum: https://in-thread.sonic-pi.net/ Sonic Pi On Stack Overflow Blog: https://stackoverflow.blog/2020/01/29/the-live-coding-language-that-lets-you-be-an-actual-rock-star/ Kortex: https://mindbuffer.net/kortex ImiTone: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/evanbalster/imitone-mind-to-melody GridSound: https://gridsound.com/#/ Audio Vis: https://github.com/willianjusten/awesome-audio-visualization Software for Graphics Thread on lines: https://llllllll.co/t/software-to-create-procedural-graphics/27660/10 Hydra Book https://naotohieda.com/blog/hydra-book/ Interactive Shader Format: https://www.interactiveshaderformat.com/ Lua + OSC bindings for Open Frameworks https://github.com/danomatika/loaf EarSketch, Georgia Tech: https://earsketch.gatech.edu/landing/#/ xi LiveCode: https://github.
